title: ANNOUNCING: Fairplex Font Release from Emigre
content:
ANNOUNCING:   
Fairplex Font Release   
Emigre (the Book) Back In Stock   
   
--------------------------------------------------------------   
Fairplex   
   
Designed by Zuzana Licko, Fairplex was inspired by features   
found in models ranging from the San Francisco Giants logo   
to Garamond. With tapered serifs that become more distinct   
and decorative as size and weight increases, and an overall   
low contrast, Fairplex is designed to function as both an   
animated headline font and highly practical text face.   
   
Fairplex Narrow Book, Italic, Bold & Bold Italic: $95   
Fairplex Narrow Medium, Italic, Black & Black Italic: $95   
Fairplex Wide Book, Italic, Bold & Bold Italic: $95   
Fairplex Wide Medium, Italic, Black & Black Italic: $95   
Available in both Macintosh or Windows formats.   
   
See our site for more Fairplex info:   
 [http://www.emigre.com/Fairplex](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015015341/http:/www.emigre.com/Fairplex)

Emigre (the Book): Graphic Design Into the Digital Realm   
   
The original Emigre book is back in stock. First published   
in 1993, it is now in its 5th printing!   
Edited and designed by Emigre.   
96 Pages, 11 x 15 inches, softcover, over 300 illustrations,   
with commentary from Rudy VanderLans and Zuzana Licko.   
Essay by Mr. Keedy.   
Regular edition: $24.95   
   
See the cover image at:   
 [http://www.emigre.com/EB.php?id=91](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015015341/http:/www.emigre.com/EB.php?id=91)   
   
The deluxe edition is signed by Zuzana Licko and Rudy VanderLans   
and presented in a hand-made, cloth-covered slipcase.   
Deluxe edition also includes The Emigre Music Sampler No.3   
compact disc.   
Deluxe edition: $50.00   
Only a few copies are left!
